  1. In the News

  1. Water Filtration Plant Open House

    We invite you to tour our Water Filtration Plant May 8, 2019 from 4:00pm - 6:30 pm. Read on...

  2. 2018 Water Quality Report

    The City's annual Water Quality Report is now ready for viewing. Read on...

  3. Accepting applications for Urban Tree Advisory Committee

    Applications are still being accepted for a position on the Urban Tree Advisory Committee. The term expires September 30, 2021. Read on...

  4. Job Opportunity: Department Support Technician

    The City of Grants Pass Public Works Department is looking for a Department Support Technician. Read on...

  5. Accepting applications for Downtown Parking Taskforce

    Applications are being accepted for four positions on the Downtown Parking Taskforce. Read on...
/CivicAlerts.aspx
  1. Road Work

  1. Road Closure Deadline Extended - Willow Lane between Kellenbeck and Redwood Highway

    Due to weather conditions, Willow Lane Road Closure has been extended through April 19 between Kellenbeck and Redwood Highway. Timber Mountain is working on the replacement of the irrigation crossing. Read on...

  2. Road Re-Construction: Willow Lane between Redwood Highway and Redwood Avenue

    Construction has begun on the Willow Lane Road Re-Construction project on Willow Lane between Redwood Highway and Redwood Avenue. Timber Mountain Construction will be installing storm drain and water line. Construction will continue through July, 2019 Read on...
/CivicAlerts.aspx
